commenter_b: If you are a salaried worker, no overtime pay. Which means you get a set rate of pay weekly or biweekly and have to work how many ever hours you have to, to finish your job. Whether it's 30 hrs or 50 hrs you get the same pay. It's like that for a lot of managers and supervisors.
